revised_title: Improved Measurement of Free-Space Velocity of Electromagnetic Waves
tldr: The authors developed an advanced millimetre-wave interferometer to measure the phase velocity of electromagnetic waves with high accuracy. They used a cavity resonator refractometer to directly determine the refractive index of the air near the interferometer, improving the measurement of the free-space wavelength and frequency. This research led to a more precise determination of the free-space velocity of electromagnetic waves.
